luisb1202.functions.carga_lanas.2_naranj: §4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c The §eintersections§c are interdimensional bridges that I myself created.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c They will allow you to §etravel through the worlds§c of this galaxy §eto search§c the §eCosmic Cores§c safely. Without a ship and without gathering unwanted attention.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You shall §ediscover§c other §eintersections§c exploring the §elast area§c of each §eintersection§c.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Most accurately, in this world lies the §6Orange Cosmic Core§c...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c A hive-world whose §equeen§c was once a §emajestic being§c, radiant with §ekindness§c.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Until the Conqueror and his scientists tormented her with their dark experiments.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Little remains of what she once was...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c We must §eretrieve the cosmic core§c from this place... and perhaps grant peace to that poor creature.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§r§l Koros §cawaits you inside. §rSpeak§c with him.
Welcome to my humble home, adventurer. I live here since I had to leave my old house, in the §eGlacial Fort§f.
§eThe Conqueror§f's attack affected the climate, turning it into an unhospitable, frozen place. Luckily, thanks to my magic boots, I could escape the winter.

Sadly, I lost §e9 of my cats§f along the way here. If you manage to do it, I will §ereward§f you with my §dboots§f! When you see one, throw one of my §3pocket portals§f at it to bring it back here. 

§2§l[QUEST]:§7 Find Maldini's §e9 cats§7, there are 3 in each area of this intersection. When you see them, §ethrow§7 a §3Maldini pocket portal§7 at them to bring them back.
